# Exploring model parameters

This page was last updated ```r Sys.time() ```


On this page I am exploring the model parameters to see if they make sense for Norway.

```{r setup, include=F, cache=T}
library(MadingleyR)
library(data.table)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(comment='%')

sptl_inp = madingley_inputs("spatial inputs")
chrt_def = madingley_inputs("cohort definition")
stck_def = madingley_inputs("stock definition")
mdl_prms = madingley_inputs("model parameters") # useful later for running the model
```


```{r}
DT::datatable(mdl_prms,
  extensions = "FixedColumns",
  options = list(
    scrollX = TRUE,
    scrollY=T,
    pageLength = 20))
```

The parameters are divided into 12 categories. which we will go through in turn
```{r}
cat(unique(mdl_prms$category), sep="\n")
```

There is some additional metadata found [here](man/metadata.xml).
